channel.title: Ray Illian on The Huddle
channel.description: Recent content in Ray Illian on The Huddle

item.title: Avoid The Pile-Up
item.description: We’ve all been there before. The throw goes up, the disc catches some wind, and just hangs. As the intended offensive receiver, you are forced to slow down and track the path of the disc. It soon becomes quite crowded around you as multiple players converge on what seems like the optimal position to vie for the disc. Soon it’s time to jump for the disc and hope everything works out.
